data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of M'Sila.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of M‘Sila, Algeria

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in M'Sila with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary: On average, 27 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in M‘Sila, Algeria.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in M‘Sila, Algeria, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 348 believers in M‘Sila, Algeria a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bedouin, Nail people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, you gave the church of M‘Sila, Algeria the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to M'Sila, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the state of M‘Sila, Algeria has a population of 510,500.

We estimate M'Sila has 348 people who might know Jesus, 42 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 510,110 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,466 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in M‘Sila, Algeria to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
